Fixes.Description:
### Xidi v4.2.0
[https://github.com/samuelgr/Xidi](https://github.com/samuelgr/Xidi)

Xidi improves the gameplay experience when using modern XInput-based controllers (such as Xbox controllers) with older games that use DirectInput or WinMM to communicate with game controllers. In more technical terms, Xidi provides both DirectInput and WinMM interfaces for games to use and communicates with XInput-based game controllers natively using XInput, translating between the two interfaces as needed.

Fixes.Description:
## Assassin's Creed 1 - Eagle Patch
*by Sergeanur*

[https://github.com/Sergeanur/EaglePatch](https://github.com/Sergeanur/EaglePatch)

**EaglePatchAC1** is an ASI plugin that fixes a number of issues in **Assassin's Creed: Director's Cut Edition**

Features:
- Unlocked multisampling on high resolutions
- Added support of all XInput controllers
- Added detection of hotplugged controllers
- Removed support of DInput controllers
- Gamepad and kb/mouse controls work at the same time (read note below)
- Added ini setting for enabling PS3-like controls
- Added ini setting to skip intro videos (without having to rename files)
- [DX10 only] Fixed doubling of resolution modes in settings

Fixes.Name: Freezes Fix
Fixes.Description:
[https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Assassin%27s_Creed#Game_freezes_regularly_for_a_few_seconds](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Assassin%27s_Creed#Game_freezes_regularly_for_a_few_seconds)

Game freezes regularly for a few seconds because the game is trying to connect to Ubisoft servers which cannot be reached anymore.

This fix will redirect all connections to Ubisoft's offline server to your own computer which will make the connections fail quickly, removing the freezing in the game. This server was used to track statistics about the game usage, so blocking the connections shouldn't cause any problem to the game.

## BloodRayne Tweaks v1.7
*by nipkownix*

[https://github.com/nipkownix/BloodRayne_tweaks](https://github.com/nipkownix/BloodRayne_tweaks)

A project designed to fix and tweak BloodRayne: Terminal Cut on Steam.

Fix HUD - Fix the HUD, moving it further away from the center of the screen.

Lock cursor to game window - Both the original version and the "Terminal Cut" have problems with multi-monitor systems. The game doesn't lock the cursor, causing it to be minimized seemingly at random when you try to attack or shoot using the mouse buttons. This happens because you're clicking outside the game's window, somewhere on your other monitor. This fix tries to properly resolve this issue by locking the cursor into the game's window.

Fixes.Name: Augustus
Fixes.Description:
## Augustus v4.0.0
*by Keriew*

[https://github.com/Keriew/augustus](https://github.com/Keriew/augustus)

The aim of this project is to provide enhanced, customizable gameplay to Caesar 3 using project Julius UI enhancements.

Augustus is able to load Caesar 3 and Julius saves, however saves made with Augustus will not work outside Augustus.

**Gameplay enhancements include:**
- Roadblocks
- Market special orders
- Global labour pool
- Partial warehouse storage
- Increased game limits
- Zoom controls
- And more!

Because of gameplay changes and additions, save files from Augustus are NOT compatible with Caesar 3 or Julius. Augustus is able to load Caesar 3 save files, but not the other way around. If you want vanilla experience with visual and UI improvements, or want to use save files in base Caesar 3, check Julius.

Fixes.Name: Julius
Fixes.Description:
## Julius v1.7.0
*by bvschaik*

[https://github.com/bvschaik/julius](https://github.com/bvschaik/julius)

Julius is a fully working open-source version of Caesar 3, with the same logic as the original, but with some UI enhancements, that can be played on multiple platforms.

The goal of the project is to have exactly the same game logic as Caesar 3, with the same look and feel. This means that the saved games are 100% compatible with Caesar 3, and any gameplay bugs present in the original Caesar 3 game will also be present in Julius.

**Enhancements for Julius include:**
- Support for widescreen resolutions
- Windowed mode support for 32-bit desktops
- A lot of small in-game quality of life improvements

## Optimal Sound Settings
*by XaivierX*
[https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2103627775](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2103627775)

The game's default audio settings are all set to 10. This can make it hard to hear what characters are saying and the end-of-level church bell is far too loud. These settings will even everything out.

Modify the sound values to these settings in the Audio section of the game's Configuration menu.

- Master Volume: 10
- Sound FX Volume: 7
- Music Volume: 9
- Dialog Volume: 10
- Cinematic Volume: 8
- Environment Volume: 8

Fixes.Name: HDR Ultrawide DLSS RT Patch
Fixes.Description:
## CONTROL - HDR Ultrawide DLSS RT Patch v1.5.1
*by filoppi*

[https://www.nexusmods.com/control/mods/90](https://www.nexusmods.com/control/mods/90)

- Native HDR (gets rid of color banding, greater contrast and brighter highlights, more natural colors).
- Improved quality of SDR output (10bit->no more color banding, slightly better dynamic range).
- Upgraded DLSS to 3.1.30 and improved its implementation (it's also now compatible with FSR 2.X injection).
- Added DLAA support (DLSS at native resolution).
- Added a new "Max" texture setting to improve the slow texture streaming (min 8GB+ VRAM, 10GB+ are recommended).
- Added a new setting to use 3x as samples for ray tracing and volumetrics, increasing the quality and reducing noise (this is VERY expensive).
- Fixed broken ray tracing reflections.
- Fixed low shadow quality when ray tracing was on.
- Full UltraWide support: unlock any resolution and aspect ratio, including 32:9+.
- Some FOV and LOD fixes for UW. Fixed UI issues at non 16:9 aspect ratios (e.g. enemies health bars were displaced).
- Added a FOV Multiplier config setting *m_fFOVMultiplier* (the game and UI are designed for the default FOV, so only use for accessibility reasons).
- Add a config to skip the intro video *m_bSkipIntroVideos*.
- Improved window+borderless+fullscreen management.

Fixes.Description:
## SilentPatch for Crazy Taxi
*by CookiePLMonster*

[https://github.com/CookiePLMonster/SilentPatchCT](https://github.com/CookiePLMonster/SilentPatchCT)

This modification fixes several bugs in the Steam version of Crazy Taxi. While some of the bugs (such as broken analog steering) already had unofficial fixes in the past, they are shipped as an executable edit and they can have some side effects depending on the gamepad used. SilentPatch also fixes several other bugs not covered by other fixes, e.g. a crash when booting the game with steering wheels connected. With this patch, the game is fully playable with a steering wheel (and a shifter), providing a full arcade experience.

**Featured fixes**
- Issues with analog steering and pressure sensitive triggers have been fixed. This applies both to XInput and DirectInput controllers.
- A crash when starting the game with specific DirectInput devices (e.g. steering wheels) has been fixed.
- Analog stick deadzones have been refined slightly to improve steering responsiveness and make it feel closer to the Dreamcast release.
- Alt + F4 now works correctly.
- When using the Windowed mode, window size has been corrected to avoid distorting the image.
- When using the Windowed mode, maximizing is now disallowed by disabling the Maximize button rather by making it non-functional.
- Restored several missing cheats/hotkeys from the original PC version. These are:
- Reset Camera (Shift+Alt+F5)
- Cinematic Camera (Shift+Alt+F6)
- First Person Camera (Shift+Alt+F7)
- Show Speedometer (Shift+Alt+F8)

Fixes.Description:
## Proper PC Experience Mod v1.7
*by ellekz*

[https://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls3/mods/1545](https://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls3/mods/1545)

- High Refresh Rate

Forces the game to use your monitor's highest refresh rate instead of 60 Hz. If you want a custom refresh rate and not the highest one, you can create a d3d11_refreshrate.ini file in the installation directory with your preferred refresh rate number in it (e.g. "120" for 120 Hz).

- High FPS

Defaults to 120 FPS to avoid physics glitches. You can still customize the FPS limit by using a d3d11_fps.ini file with the desired number in it. You should prefer to use Nvidia's Control Panel or RTSS to cap the game's frame rate though.

- G-Sync

Game is smooth as butter now with high refresh rate and high FPS.

- Ultrawide

Some enemies might render at a low frame rate at the very edge of your screen. Not too distracting though when it happens.

- Increased FOV

Adds 25° on 16:9 monitors, 15° on 21:9 monitors, and 10° on 32:9 monitors. You can customize how much FOV should be added by using a d3d11_fov.ini file (e.g. "0" would add nothing to the default FOV).

- Skip Intro

No more getting flashbanged or losing valuable life time waiting that could be spent playing instead.

- Multiplayer support is available through Qtracker.
- Adds support for widescreen resolutions and anisotropic filtering.
- Loading now doesn't require the ticking sound to be played. Loading is much faster.
- Updated and greatly improved AI paths and nodes.
- Options to play without sidekicks.

- HD texture support.
- Glowmap support.
- Supported added for mouse buttons.
- And many more.

Fixes.Name: Disable Head Bobbing
Fixes.Description:
Deadfall Adventures - Disable Head Bobbing
By Greenskin

[https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=814710743](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=814710743)

This game uses excessive head bobbing when moving which can cause motion sickness. To disable it use a text editor to edit the `ADVGame.ini` located in `[YOUR_DOCUMENTS]\My Games\Deadfall Adventures\ADVGame\Config` folder. 

Near the top, in the `[Configuration] [EvilGame.UTPawn]` section, change to the values below;

```
Bob=0.000
bWeaponBob=false
```

Save the file.

Fixes.Name: No Intro Fix
Fixes.Description:
Use a text editor to edit the `ADVEngine.ini` located in `[YOUR_DOCUMENTS]\My Games\Deadfall Adventures\ADVGame\Config` folder.

Near the bottom, in the `[FullScreenMovie]` section, locate the line `StartupMovies=StartLogo` and add a `;` (Semi-Colon) at the start of the line.

Save the file.

## Gold Filter Restoration
*by CookiePLMonster*

[https://github.com/CookiePLMonster/DXHRDC-GFX](https://github.com/CookiePLMonster/DXHRDC-GFX)

A plugin for Deus Ex: Human Revolution Director’s Cut, restoring the gold filter, post processing and shading from the original Deus Ex: Human Revolution.

With this plugin, you can freely choose what elements of the game’s visuals should be changed. The following options are available:

- Color grading - enabled, disabled
- Bloom - DC style, HR style
- Lighting - DC style, DC style with fixes, HR style
- The configuration menu (accessed by pressing F11) also allows to freely modify color grading attributes or select from 3 presets based on the data taken directly from DXHR.

Fixes.Name: Visible Upgrade
Fixes.Description:
## Visible Upgrade: Unofficial patch for Deus Ex 2 v1.2.0
*by snobel*

[https://www.ttlg.com/forums/showthread.php?t=147423](https://www.ttlg.com/forums/showthread.php?t=147423)

The patch contains various bugfixes and game improvements such as widescreen support, and provides a few tweaks. It optionally bundles the Unified Texture Pack. It works with the GOG and Steam versions of the game.

**Original game bugs and issues that have been fixed or improved:**

- Multicore fix. Can be switched off for better performance (when it works)
- Some speed-up of level loading, especially with vsync on
- Fix for the desktop being visible during level loading on Vista and up. (Fullscreen only)
- Fix for the mouse freezing or becoming invisible when using large font size settings in Windows

**Game improvements:**

- All resolutions reported by the system, plus an optional custom display mode, are available from the options screen. The aspect ratio is shown as well
- Easy switching between fullscreen and windowed mode
- Field of view adjustment for widescreen is automatic - the horizontal view is extended instead of cropping off the top and bottom. This includes conversations and binocular/scope zoom
- In addition the FOV can be adjusted to the user's preference
- The HUD and menus are shown correctly, regardless of resolution and aspect ratio. In 3-monitor modes, the HUD is constricted to the middle monitor by default
- Loading screens are shown correctly, at 4:3 aspect
- The intro and cutscenes, which are letterboxed, are allowed to crop to fit the monitor (up to 16:9, a bit less when subtitles are on)
- The fullscreen game can run on a display other than the primary. (Experimental)

- Large Address Aware flag enabled in both executables (AKA the 4GB patch).
- All hard-coded frame caps present in the engine are removed. This solves the notorious stuttering issues when moving the in-game camera, very noticeable in modern computers. The 'FPS Cap' setting is also removed. In a future it may get re-implemented, but a lot of research and hard work has to be done first. Enabling VSync or limiting the max FPS with an external tool is highly recommended.
- Fullscreen and Borderless Window checkboxes added to the graphic options menu.
- 'CustomCameraFOV' (Field Of View) option added to globalswitches.xml. In a future, this setting will be moved to the in-game options menu.
- 'PlayIntroVideo' option added to globalswitches.xml
- Mouse middle button (scroll wheel) is now bindable.
- Keybinds can now be unassigned by pressing ESC.
- Camera horizontal movement in human form has been changed to work in the same way as the vertical one. This indirectly also fixes the problem with camera rotation being way too slow when playing with high FPS and the mouse sensitivity setting making almost no difference in this situation; dragon form is not yet fixed and still suffers from this issue.

Fixes.Name: Graphics Enhancements
Fixes.Description:
## Enslaved: Odyssey to the West - Graphics Enhancements

[https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Enslaved:_Odyssey_to_the_West#Enhancements](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Enslaved:_Odyssey_to_the_West#Enhancements)

This will fix the very noticable shadow banding on characters and improve graphics. Edit the `MonkeyEngine.ini` in the folder `[YOUR_DOCUMENTS]\My Games\UnrealEngine3\MonkeyGame\Config\` with a text editor and change the values to the ones listed below;

```
MaxMultisamples=1
ShadowFilterQualityBias=8
MinShadowResolution=128
MaxShadowResolution=2048
ShadowFilterRadius=5.0
ShadowDepthBias=0.036
MaxAnisotropy=16
```

NOTE: The "MaxMultisamples" value is Anti-Aliasing and can be set to a desired value of (1, 2, 4, 8, 16) depending on your GPU capabilities.

Fixes.Name: Better Fullscreen
Fixes.Description:
## Better Fullscreen
*by Mortadellinha*

[https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=569548325](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=569548325)

By default the game launches windowed at 544 x 416 resolution. If you press F1 you can set the game to launch in fullscreen, however as the built-in scaling is linear, a black border will appear around the screen area and also windows and apps can be shifted to other monitors when using multiple monitors.

A better fullscreen method is to run the game windowed. Then press F6 three times and then press F5 once. 

F6 scales the windowed screen up to the maximum size of the monitor, and F5 makes the game borderless windowed. Once this is done once, the game will remember it and will always run fullscreen borderless windowed with no black borders around the screen.

Fixes.Name: Fallout Et Tu
Fixes.Description:
## Fallout1in2 v1.9.3324
*by rotators*

[https://github.com/rotators/Fo1in2](https://github.com/rotators/Fo1in2)

This project brings FALLOUT 1 into the engine of FALLOUT 2.

- Replicates FALLOUT 1 in 2 almost 1:1.
- Comes with the Hero Appearance mod integrated (Bald Dude, Long Hair Dude, Black Dude, Punk Girl).
- FALLOUT 2 styled merchant inventory restocking.
- Party members and generic NPCs can be pushed out of the way.
- Party members level up and change their appearance based on worn armor.
- Party members can be controlled in combat.
- Automatic door opening and closing.
- Traverse the wastes on your very own motorcycle!
- Selected FALLOUT 2 weapons have been added (sparingly!) to the game world in ways that don't break the game balance.
- Weapons can be upgraded in FALLOUT 2 style.
- Explore classic FALLOUT 2 style cavern and new mining site encounter maps.
- Stumble over FALLOUT 2 critters such as Geckos in encounter maps.
- The original endgame is too easy? Try the new tougher mutants setting!
- Continue playing after the main story has been completed.
- Lots of bugfixes, making the game run more stable than even the original with patches.

Fixes.Name: Fixt Vanilla
Fixes.Description: ## Fallout Fixt v0.81a [https://www.nma-fallout.com/resources/fallout-fixt-full-all-fixes-and-mods.8/](https://www.nma-fallout.com/resources/fallout-fixt-full-all-fixes-and-mods.8/) The goal of Fallout Fixt is to enhance, fix and improve the Fallout 1 experience. This includes fixing bugs, restoring features, modifying balance, adding features, and many fixes to text/dialog. In addition to that, all other available mods and patches are rolled into Fixt (see below), meaning that Fallout Fixt is the only thing needed for "the best" Fallout 1 experience. As of the most recent version, this mod fixes roughly 150 bugs still present in the unofficial patches, and adds roughly 170 features. In addition, there are hundreds if not thousands of text&dialog fixes. **Things included in this patch:** - Official Interplay patches (1.1, 1.2) - TeamX patches (1.2, 1.21, 1.3.5) - No Children Fix - Cathedral Crash Fix (and other fixes by Sduibek for the Cathedral, Military Base and The Glow crashes) - Nimrod's Dialog Fixes - FreeSpace variable is set to 0 by default, so you won't have to worry about that crash either. **Not compatible with Fallout Et Tu**

## Fallout2 Restoration Project v28
*by BGforgeNet*

[https://github.com/BGforgeNet/Fallout2_Restoration_Project](https://github.com/BGforgeNet/Fallout2_Restoration_Project)

The purpose of this project is to add back into Fallout 2 all the missing content (locations, NPCs, quests, items, etc) that were pulled or left unfinished in the original game.
This expansion attempts to stay true to what made Fallout great and thus the new content you find is not something I felt that would be cool to see, but rather a reality of what the original devs wanted. I admit that I had to make some judgment calls here and there, but the core of what you will see is something originally thought up by the Fallout 2 devs.

Fixes.Changelog:
- v3.3: water foam fix
- v3.2.1: minor shader tweak and fixed plugin sdk compatibility
Improved PCSS/CHSS: better visuals, performance and added customizable settings
Fixed minimap blip animations at high framerates
Added a setting to display ped health with free aim
Added a setting to toggle between PC and console car reflection intensity

The mouse cursor is now hidden when using a gamepad

Fixed flickering outlines around shores
Improved water transparency
Fixed radio reset after cutscene
- v3.1.1: Fixed dark phone screen issue when some of the post-fx options were enabled.
- v3.1.0: Fixed an issue with "Cutscene Only" DoF setting
- v3.0.9: Added ForceNoMemRestrict parameter, this commandline option is enabled by default when using Fusion Fix now
- v3.0.9: Removed black void under the skydome
- v3.0.9: Fixed camera stutter when swimming with a controller
- v3.0.8: fixed CLEO Redux compatibility

Fixes.Description:
## Uncensored Hitman 2 Silent Assassin for Steam

[https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1663221359](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1663221359)

It should not be a secret for fans of Hitman franchise that shortly after release Hitman 2 was censored under pressure of Sikh activist groups. Steam 1.02 version unlike 1.01 version that is sold on GOG is censored. It has altered and cut mission briefs and dialogs. Also some textures and models were altered.

This fix downgrades game to version 1.01

## A complete widescreen fix for Hitman 2 Silent Assassin

[https://www.nexusmods.com/hitman2silentassassin/mods/26](https://www.nexusmods.com/hitman2silentassassin/mods/26)

**This fix provides the following features:**
- Correct widescreen aspect ratio while maintaining the original field of view (FOV).
- Vsync is working and enabled by default.
- Ability to limit the frame rate through the video driver control panel (60 FPS limit is recommended).
- Built-in antialiasing (x8) and anisotropic filtering (x16) enabled.
- Fully stable solution with no crashes or graphics bugs.

## A complete widescreen fix for Hitman Codename 47

[https://www.nexusmods.com/hitmancodename47/mods/3](https://www.nexusmods.com/hitmancodename47/mods/3)

**This fix provides the following features:**
- Correct widescreen aspect ratio while maintaining the original field of view (FOV).
- Vsync is working and enabled by default.

## Homefront - PhysX Fix
*by LuKeStorm*

[https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2882-homefront-physx-fix/](https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2882-homefront-physx-fix/)

Upon first launching the game, a pop-up will appear saying "PhysX is not installed correctly..." and will force you to install PhysX Legacy and also force you to reboot.

This fix will install the needed PhysX components directly into the game folder without requiring (legacy) PhysX installation. (Doesn't change any game/system files)

Fixes.Name: Graphics Cleanup Mod
Fixes.Description:
## Hydrophobia Prophecy - Graphics Cleanup Mod
by *ArtInPinkerton*

[https://steamcommunity.com/app/92000/discussions/0/1739968490568418375/](https://steamcommunity.com/app/92000/discussions/0/1739968490568418375/)

ArtInPinkerton's Hydrophobia Graphics Cleanup Mod fixes many visual effects to provide greater visual clarity. To acheive this the absolutely terrible Ambient Occlusion is disabled, overblown bloom effects are removed and janky shadowing is fixed.

Also the Water Lens effect is disabled by default, but can be re-enabled by going to the "ShaderOverride\VertexShaders" folder and find the text file that has "//water lens" at the top and delete this file to re-enable effect.

NOTE: Game may appear darker due to removing these effects, however you can compensate for this by going to the games's display settings and setting the Contrast to about 80%.
Fixes.Notes: DX9Settings.ini has "InitMouse = false" line added as per PCGW and Steam forums guidance.

## Neptastic Mod v1.1.7
*by tlaik*

[https://github.com/tlaik/neptastic](https://github.com/tlaik/neptastic)

Graphical improvements mod for Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1, Re;Birth2 and Re;Birth3 games.

- Resolution upscaling and downscaling
- Fitting resolution to window size (Base game always renders at 1088p)
- Disabled FXAA that degraded visuals inside dungeons
- Tutorials don't break in Re;Birth3
- Anisotropic texture filtering
- FPS unlock for Re;Birth1 and Re;Birth2
- Improved Bloom shader
- Bloom intensity & contrast settings
- Increased shadow quality - to 8192x8192 and beyond
- Outlines intensity control, as well as optional simple outlines shader
- VSync options: On, Off, Adaptive
- Nep: Nep

*by bangstk*

[https://github.com/bangstk/ogg-winmm](https://github.com/bangstk/ogg-winmm)

Fixes.Name: Original Launcher
Fixes.Description:
##Jet Set Radio - Original Launcher
*by Keith*

[https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2750-jet-set-radio-original-launcher/](https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2750-jet-set-radio-original-launcher/)

This patch is a replacement launcher that allows you to enable borderless fullscreen windowed mode which was removed from the latest version of the game. This older launcher version is digitally signed by SEGA EUROPE LIMITED on August ‎9, ‎2012.

## Mars War Logs - Yellow Artifacts Fix (for AMD GPU)

[https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Mars:_War_Logs#Yellow_artifacts](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Mars:_War_Logs#Yellow_artifacts)

This issue affects AMD GPU users. This fix involves using DXVK to render the game in Vulkan. 

The yellow visual glitches on the UI is because the game was made using Nvidia specific shader features and AMD was never able to properly work around all the bugs/issues that resulted.
Fixes.Notes: Only the x32 d3d9.dll is required from DXVK.

Fixes.Description:
## Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee - R.E.L.I.V.E. Source Port (Dec 2023)

[https://aliveteam.github.io/index.html](https://aliveteam.github.io/index.html)

R.E.L.I.V.E. is a open source drop-in engine replacement for "Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee" and "Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus" that provides native resolution support, windowed mode, controller support and bugfixes.

Video Settings Keyboard Shortcuts:
- F5 - Quiksave
- F6 - Quikload
- F12 - Toggle Fullscreen
- F11 - Toggle Stretching
- F10 - Toggle Smoothing

R.E.L.I.V.E. features:
- fixes over a hundred bugs in the original games
- fixes the stuttering cutscenes
- allows the games to run on Linux and MacOS
- allows you to play in windowed mode
- allows you to play with a controller out of the box
- lets you run the game in arbitrarily large resolutions

The engine remains faithful to the original games and there should be no noticeable gameplay difference between playing the original versions and R.E.L.I.V.E.

Fixes.Name: Dash Faction
Fixes.Description:
## Dash Faction v1.8.0

Dash Faction is a Red Faction game modification designed to fix original game bugs, improve compatibility with modern hardware and software, extend functionality, and improve graphical quality and engine performance.

**Features:**
- Multiplayer level auto-downloader (uses https://autodl.factionfiles.com just like Pure Faction)
- Spectate mode (first person or free camera)
- Widescreen support
- Windowed and borderless display modes
- Autosaving support for singleplayer
- Better graphical quality (anti-aliasing, higher texture color depth, anisotropic filtering, higher scanner view and mirror resolutions, LOD model improvements and more)
- Improved security (enabled Data Execution Prevention, multiple buffer overflow fixes)
- Multiple game limits raised/removed
- Improved scoreboard with Kills/Deaths column
- Information about killer's weapon displayed in chat
- Option to disable level ambient sounds
- ui.vpp cheating prevention
- Multiple fixes for high FPS (currently limited to 240), especially the infamous exploding submarine bug
- Country-specific edition support (properly handles game directory structure for German and French editions)
- Improved game performance
- Voting support for dedicated servers
- Hit-sound support for dedicated servers
- Other usability and stability enhancements

## Minor Sprite Fixing Project

A pass on all 300+ new alternate actor sprites to painstakingly adjust their sprite offsets. The end result is that the alternate actors now appear perfectly consistent, accurate, and as smooth in motion as intended by Apogee's artists in 1994. The author also fixed minor art errors as he came across them and addressed some technical color palette issues.

## 1.2 OPL Music Patch Option

Mod reintroduces the 1.2 DOS soundtrack as a new selectable choice in the audio options

## Original Apogee Logo

A simple and straightforward mod to tug at your nostalgia: a restoration of the original 1994 Apogee logo for the game intro!

## JC's Security Spikes for K1 1.1
*by JCarter426*

[https://deadlystream.com/files/file/1439-jcs-security-spikes-for-k1](https://deadlystream.com/files/file/1439-jcs-security-spikes-for-k1)

Security spikes are disposable items that give the player a temporary boost to their Security skill when activated, helping them pick more difficult locks. At least, that's how it's supposed to be. That's how they work on the Xbox version, and in KOTOR 2, but security spikes don't actually do anything at all on the PC version of KOTOR 1.

This fix replicates the security spikes' intended function as best as I could manage. They’ve been given an activate item property and appear in the non-medical item slot (along with stimulants and shields).

## Sonic CD - RSDKv3-Decompilation Port v1.3.2
*by RSDKModding*

[https://github.com/RSDKModding/RSDKv3-Decompilation](https://github.com/RSDKModding/RSDKv3-Decompilation)

The vanilla game only supports 5:3 aspect ratio, which is stretched to fit the set resolution and makes the game quite blurry. This full decompilation port of Sonic CD allows for proper widescreen resolution support and much crisper visuals via the native nearest-neighbor/pixel-perfect scaling of this fix.

Features:
- Sharp, pixel-perfect display.
- Controls are completely remappable via the settings.ini file.
- Allows Fullscreen/Windowed mode toggle with F4.
- Native Windows x64 version.

To change various setting click the "Open Config" button or manually edit the "settings.ini" in the game folder after installation.
Fixes.Notes: RSDKv3_64.exe renamed to soniccd.exe and FullScreen=true set in settings.ini.

Fixes.Name: Remove Update Check
Fixes.Description:
## Spec Ops: The Line - Remove Update Check
*by LuKeStorm*

[https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2962-spec-ops-the-line-ini-decryptencrypt-tool-rewritten/](https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2962-spec-ops-the-line-ini-decryptencrypt-tool-rewritten/)

This fix will replace SREngine.ini in your Documents folder with an edited version with the update check timeout set to 1 sec (instead of 60 secs) effectly bypassing the sometimes lengthy update check.

The line edited is;
```
[IpDrv.OnlineTitleFileDownloadMcp]
TimeOut=60
```

The "TimeOut=60" was changed to "TimeOut=1" then the SREngine.ini file was re-encrypted. This file was edited using the decrypt tool Spec Ops: The Line - INI Decrypt/Encrypt Tool (rewritten) by LuKeStorm based on the tool by Rick Gibbed from 2012.

## Superdimension Neptune VS Sega Hard Girls - Resolution Unlock
*by Mad Cat Lad*

[https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=946915551](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=946915551)

This mod allows changing the render resolution beyond the max default 1080p and includes support for downsampling. Also disables the blurry outlines on characters by default.

For the best possible crisp edge details the default settings in nep_config.txt are set to downsample from 4K to your monitors resolution. To change this, click the config file button (or open nep_config.txt in the game folder) and enter your chosen resolution e.g.  render_width 2560 & render_height 1440p and click save.

Note: If you encounter the "missing leaves in trees bug" you can set "disable_outlines 0" in nep_config.txt. However, this brings back the blurry outlines so it may be worth putting up with this minor bug.

Fixes.Name: DDrawCompat
Fixes.Description:
## Syberia - DDrawCompat v0.5.4
*by narzoul*

[https://github.com/narzoul/DDrawCompat](https://github.com/narzoul/DDrawCompat)

Syberia has difficulty running on modern systems but DDrawCompat will make the game work properly, fullscreen with the correct 4:3 aspect ratio.

Note: Alt-tabbing while playing the game is not recommended as the game GUI will show black artifacts after returning to the game. However, the black artifacts will go away when you move to another screen in-game and won't return.

DDrawCompat is a DLL wrapper aimed at fixing compatibility and performance issues for games based on DirectDraw and Direct3D 1-7.

- Increases performance and prevents visual glitches

- Maintains game's original 4:3 aspect ratio in fullscreen (no stretching)

- Prevents desktop icons/windows from moving around when using multiple monitors
Fixes.Notes: Only since DDrawCompat v0.5.4 has Syberia worked perfect for me.

Fixes.Name: Restoration Project
Fixes.Description:
## Tomb Raider The Angel of Darkness Restoration Project v1.4

[https://www.tombraiderforums.com/showthread.php?t=226260](https://www.tombraiderforums.com/showthread.php?t=226260)

Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness is often called "TR's most broken adventure," and for good reason. Overall, it's left many players simply writing the game off. The primary objective of TR:AoD Restoration Project is to reconstruct the game as close to its intended vision as possible.

Using concepts inspired by both Core Design devs and lead writer Murti Schofield, Restoration tweaks and refines movement and combat, plus extras to enhance user experience. The story, too, saw revision: fleshing out the notebook, subtly altering levels, and adding unused voice lines to help players piece together the story in a natural way. The end result closely follows the direction and themes of the game as released - just polished.

This includes, but is not limited to:
- Refined story elements and existing content, and corrected plot holes.
- Pickup balancing, particularly for health items. Provided greater reward for exploration.
- Utilization of cut content: can organically collect and use the iconic dual pistols, re-enabled enemies, restored voice lines, and more.
- Greater emphasis on environmental storytelling. Includes notebook tweaks, gameplay elements, etc.
- Various level enhancements: visual and gameplay fixes, revised interactivity, and subtle level alterations as needed to suit the project's scope.

Fixes.Name: Resolution Crash Fix
Fixes.Description:
## Two Worlds Epic Edition - Resolution Crash Fix

Two Worlds Epic Edition can crash when you select a resolution other than the default 1024x768. 

The solution is to first select "Window Mode" with the default 1024x768 resolution, then click "Accept". The game will go Windowed. Next go back to Settings/Graphics and select your chosen resolution e.g. 1920x1080 and untick the "Window Mode" button. Click "Accept". 

The game will now work fullscreen at your chosen resolution.

- Extra settings for camera zoom and behavior during combat; found in Options -> Gameplay
- Can disable intro logo playback; 'Play InXile Intro' setting in Options -> Gameplay
- Expanded portrait selection during character creation
- Far more moddable
- Many more fixes....

For a full list of fixes/changes visit the mod page. A few small gameplay mods are included in the patched DLL. They can be enabled by going to the Options -> Modding panel from the main menu.
Fixes.Notes: Repackaged the .dll and localization files into one zip.

GameName: White Day: A Labyrinth Named School

Fixes.Name: Sui's Hack
Fixes.Description:
## White Day: A Labyrinth Named School - Sui's Hack v1.1
*by SuicideMachine*

[https://github.com/SuiMachine/White-Day---Sui-s-Hack](https://github.com/SuiMachine/White-Day---Sui-s-Hack)

Features:
- Enables Anisotropic Filtering (AF) 	
- Adds 120, 144, 165 fps cap options to game settings. If your monitor has a different refresh rate (e.g. 75) that option will also appear in the settings menu. (Default game only has 30 and 60 FPS cap)
- Enables sensitivity + inversion for mouse in Options (Default options previously only affected the controller)
- Ability to change speaker mode from Stereo to Quad, 5.1, 7.1, Surround and Prologic.
- Includes cheat options (disabled by default)

After installing press F11 in-game to show the plugin GUI on the top left of the screen, or after starting the game once, go to <game folder>/BepInEx/config and edit SuisHack.cfg manually.

Note: Some monitors report refresh rates as float values. For example Samsung's Odyssey G7 instead of reporting 240Hz to the system, reports 239.958 Hz. Unity expects integer values, so this will become 239 fps. If this happens, you can use "Increase refresh rate by one" setting in BepInEx/config/SuisHack.cfg.
Fixes.Notes: Run game once to generate SuisHack.cfg

Fixes.Name: ECWolf
Fixes.Description:
## ECWolf v1.4.1
*by Blzut3*

[https://maniacsvault.net/ecwolf/](https://maniacsvault.net/ecwolf/)

ECWolf is an advanced source port for Wolfenstein 3D, Spear of Destiny, and Super 3D Noah's Ark based off of the Wolf4SDL code base. ECWolf pulls a substantial amount of code from ZDoom and aims to provide a wide array of mod editing capabilities without the need to modify the source code. Most importantly you will no longer need to replace entire data sets. With ECWolf you could for example add a weapon without needing to distribute every sprite in the game along with it. Mods will be neatly packaged into a single file just like they are for Doom.

For players, ECWolf provides many useful features such as better control binding, support for wide screen resolutions, and unlimited save slots. ECWolf allows you to keep all of your game data in one directory as one binary plays all supported games. Support for even more Wolfenstein engine games is planned for the future! (I know you're all waiting for Blake Stone support.) In terms of accuracy to vanilla Wolf, it is about the same as the accuracy of ZDoom to vanilla Doom.

## SilentPatch for Yakuza 3, Yakuza 4 & Yakuza 5 Remastered
*by Silent*

[https://github.com/CookiePLMonster/SilentPatchYRC](https://github.com/CookiePLMonster/SilentPatchYRC)

- CPU usage has been significantly cut down in all 3 games.
- A low level keyboard hook potentially causing issues with slow typing speed has been removed.
- Fixed a potential random startup crash.
- Fixed several issues related to non-ASCII user names, most notably a freeze when using Print Circle photo booths in Yakuza 5.

*by Silent*

- Arcade games are now forcibly capped to 60 FPS, even if "Framelimit" option is set to 30 FPS in options
